titleStmt.title: An incomparable collection of original paintings, and others by the best masters both ancient and modern, some whereof are part of the collection of a person of quality. The masters names are Sir P. Paul Ruben Sir Ant. Van Dyck Rembrandt Breughel ... will be sold at auction at VVills coffee-house at the west-end of the Court of Requests, over against the painted Chamber, near VVestminster-hall, on Monday the 22d. of this instant February, 1691. and the following days till all are sold; and then will conclude (this season) the sale of paintings at Westminster. The sale beginning at ten of the clock in the morning. By John Bullord.
titleStmt.author: Bullord, John.

titleStmt.title: An incomparable collection of original paintings, and others by the best masters both ancient and modern, some whereof are part of the collection of a person of quality. The sale beginning at ten of the clock in the morning. By John Bullord.
titleStmt.author: Bullord, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Catalogues are distributed gratis at the coffee-houses in Westminster-hall, and at the place of sale. The conditions as usual,

notesStmt.note: The date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Pagination begins on verso of title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
